akn:content.akn:p: (a) Description of nonnavigable area Subject to subsections (b) and (c), the area of Long Island City, Queens County, New York, that— is declared to be nonnavigable waters of the United States.
(c) Expiration date The declaration of nonnavigability under subsection (a) shall expire with respect to a portion of the area described in subsection (a), if the portion—
